metadata.title: Skills Hot - AI Agent Skills Marketplace | Install Skills for Claude Code, Cursor & Codex
metadata.description: Discover, install, and manage skills for your AI coding agents. The official marketplace for Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf, and Codex. One command to unlock new AI capabilities.

hero.subtitle: Discover, install, and manage skills for Claude Code, Codex, and beyond. One command to unlock new capabilities.

cliFirst.title: CLI First
cliFirst.description: Install skills directly from your terminal. No UI needed, just one command.

openSecure.title: Open & Secure
openSecure.description: All skills are open source and auditable. Know exactly what you're installing.

universal.title: Universal
universal.description: Works with Claude Code, Cursor, Windsurf, Codex, and any agent that reads SKILL.md.
